```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(widyr)
library(npmi)

# Load example data
threads <- read_csv2(system.file("extdata", "threads.csv", package = "npmi"))

```

```{r}

# Pairwise count with widyr package
threads %>%
  pairwise_count(feature,id,upper=F, diag=F) %>%
  arrange(item1,item2)

```


```{r}

# Count pairs with npmi package
threads %>%
  select(item=id,feature,weight) %>%
  count_pairs()

```
